column1: #FORMAT=WebAnno TSV 3.2
#T_SP=de.tudarmstadt.ukp.dkpro.core.api.ner.type.NamedEntity|identifier|value
#T_CH=de.tudarmstadt.ukp.dkpro.core.api.coref.type.CoreferenceLink|referenceRelation|referenceType
#Text=Tenzin says : " I ca n't believe the Earth Queen is conscripting airbenders . "
#Text=Korra says : " Those people should not be forced to join an army ! "
#Text=Bumi says : " Well , technically , the Earth Queen has a right to conscript her citizens .
#Text=He might have been taken too .
#Text=" Bolin says : " Probably not .
#Text=He 's surprisingly difficult to catch , like a — like a little , greased hog - monkey .
#Text=" Jinora says : " But , what if he was ?
#Text=" Korra says : " Do n't worry , Jinora .
#Text=We 'll find him .
#Text=We just need to figure out where to look .
#Text=" Mako says : " I bet they 're under Lake Laogai .
#Text=What ?
#Text=I 've been reading some of Jinora 's books .
#Text=The old Dai Li agents used to have a secret fortress beneath the lake .
#Text=" Jinora says : " Mako 's right !
#Text=It 's the perfect spot to hide airbenders , and I know how to check it out without being caught .
#Text=I can project my spirit into it !
#Text=" Bumi says : " You mean that out - of - body thing you did to help giant , spirity Korra ?
#Text=" Tenzin says : " You can still do that ?!
#Text=" Jinora says : " It 's not as powerful as it was during Harmonic Convergence , but if I can get close enough , I think I can do it .
#Text=" Korra says : " Let 's go get Kai out .
#Text=Let 's get all the airbenders out .
#Text="
